channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @MCinHD This batch sat for a day and a half. 😃 We wanted to try it a couple of times before investing in equipment. Need a mason jar and a proper grinder.
item.source:markdown: @MCinHD This batch sat for a day and a half. 😃 We wanted to try it a couple of times before investing in equipment. Need a mason jar and a proper grinder.

item.description: Cold brew attempt number 2. First time I tried to put 1 liter of water in the 1 liter French press, which leaves no room for grounds! This time was 840 ml water to 160 g coffee, producing 500 ml concentrate, dilute 1:1 to drink. https://t.co/T6eJ5Um9Fh
item.source:markdown: Cold brew attempt number 2. First time I tried to put 1 liter of water in the 1 liter French press, which leaves no room for grounds! This time was 840 ml water to 160 g coffee, producing 500 ml concentrate, dilute 1:1 to drink. https://t.co/T6eJ5Um9Fh

item.description: @NuwOne All one flight, and no rest room on board either. 😃 He’s getting better with experience and training, as well as knowing the weather and planning the night before.
item.source:markdown: @NuwOne All one flight, and no rest room on board either. 😃 He’s getting better with experience and training, as well as knowing the weather and planning the night before.

item.description:
Our son called to say he’d be coming home late tonight… understandable since he flew a glider nearly 10 hours and over 900 km today.

Triangle to Poland, Dessau, and back. New personal bests for time and distance. https://t.co/EXlFj6AgN8
item.source:markdown:
Our son called to say he’d be coming home late tonight… understandable since he flew a glider nearly 10 hours and over 900 km today.
Triangle to Poland, Dessau, and back. New personal bests for time and distance. https://t.co/EXlFj6AgN8

item.description: @bzbear2 I just tried to get the 2nd booster 3 months after my infection, but the doc told me to wait another 3 months as I’m not in a risk group 🤷‍♂️
item.source:markdown: @bzbear2 I just tried to get the 2nd booster 3 months after my infection, but the doc told me to wait another 3 months as I’m not in a risk group 🤷‍♂️

item.description: I don’t know what your rush hour traffic is like, but we just had 15 sheep (regular sheep, not Heidschnucken) herded down our cobblestone street (by people, not dogs)
item.source:markdown: I don’t know what your rush hour traffic is like, but we just had 15 sheep (regular sheep, not Heidschnucken) herded down our cobblestone street (by people, not dogs)

item.description: @ClaireSmith1848 @40PercentGerman Ditto. Given true facts and a fair choice people will make good decisions. #democracy

item.description:
Thunderstorm rolling through and the temp just dropped by 5°C https://t.co/UGLwEzbyXp

Pardon me, has now dropped 15°C https://t.co/FUek557rU0

Our neighbor reported her 5 minute commute from work took 45 minutes because 5 routes she tried were blocked by fallen trees. She ended up taking a trail along a farmer’s field to get home.

We’re still hearing sirens from civil defense and fire trucks 90 minutes after the storm was over
item.source:markdown:
Thunderstorm rolling through and the temp just dropped by 5°C https://t.co/UGLwEzbyXp
Pardon me, has now dropped 15°C https://t.co/FUek557rU0
Our neighbor reported her 5 minute commute from work took 45 minutes because 5 routes she tried were blocked by fallen trees. She ended up taking a trail along a farmer’s field to get home.
We’re still hearing sirens from civil defense and fire trucks 90 minutes after the storm was over

item.description: @Regensbloggerin I generally let unrecognized numbers go to voicemail. DA is always considerate and leaves a message.
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin I generally let unrecognized numbers go to voicemail. DA is always considerate and leaves a message.

item.description: @Regensbloggerin I get (very rarely) 3 kinds of spam calls: fake Microsoft, fake Europol, and Democrats Abroad 😛
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin I get (very rarely) 3 kinds of spam calls: fake Microsoft, fake Europol, and Democrats Abroad 😛
